alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 09 at 8:32PM MST until March 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Kansas, northeast Colorado and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST /noon CST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
